Text:
Maybe it's useful to put the right tracks in the right folder.
So not numbers 1, 2, 3, 4, 7, 8, 10, 14, 16, 20, 21 of CD1 + 5, 6, 9, 11, 12, 13, 15, 17, 18, 19 of CD2 in the folder CD1 and all the others in the folder CD2

And it would also be useful to put the right tracks into your download...
Number 6 of CD1 is What the World Needs Now (Diana Ross) in your download, while it should be Santa's List (Cliff Richard).
